slides.title: LeapFrog
slides.text: Project by B Horn and C Parker

slides.title: What did we do?
slides.text: We wrote code that send gesture information from the leap Motion to a websocket, a util to display the our hands position and various other tools

slides.title: Other tools
slides.text: This presentation was made by a tool we made this weekend. It lets us navigate by using hand gestures.

slides.title: Experience using the Leap Motion
slides.text: Getting set up was fairly easy, had issue getting the python dev tools to work. (Only worked on Linux, not OSX)
